name: Soup's On! - 32bit Game Jam 2022
description:
You are a FORMEALYOR.

A servant created to assist in running the Food Truck. Grow crops to add "fresh" fruits and veggies to your world famous soup, but be careful its not as simple as that. Something hungry lurks out in the night, and it isn't your customers.

We highly recommend doing the tutorial before beginning level 1

CREDIT:

  • Art - Kyle Hernandez (h0tel) and Angel Juarez (FunnyAngeli)
  • Programming - Kyle Hernandez and Paul Slaughter
  • Music - City
  • UI and Logo - Angel Juarez
  • Playtesting - Twiggy, Kim,  Angel, City, and Paul
  • Sounds- Freesound.org 
  • Textures created by craiyon AI

-Update: Fixed a typo on the credits after publishing
